p: The peripheral analgesic and anti-inflammatory activities were evaluated using a model adopted by Hunskaar and Hole [ 26]. Immediately after inhalation, animals were withdrawn from the chamber and 20 μL of a 2.5% (v/v) formalin solution in PBS was injected subcutaneously into the right hind paw. Animals were then transferred to a transparent acrylic box subdivided into six equal square areas. The time that mice licked their right hind paw in the first five minutes and from 15 to 30 minutes following completion of the inhalation test was timed.
